channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Senators call for Alex Pretti death investigation. And, winter storm recovery efforts
item.description: Minneapolis strikes and protests continue after ICE's fatal shooting of Alex Pretti. And, states work to recover from a massive winter storm that has left widespread power outages and flight chaos.
item.content:encoded:
Minneapolis strikes and protests continue after ICE's fatal shooting of Alex Pretti. And, states work to recover from a massive winter storm that has left widespread power outages and flight chaos.

(Image credit: Octavio Jones)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: How long do you need to spend in the gym to get strong? Less than you think
item.description: If you're procrastinating working out, here's one less excuse. Short gym sessions can be enough to build meaningful strength — as long as you push yourself while you're there.
item.content:encoded: If you're procrastinating working out, here's one less excuse. Short gym sessions can be enough to build meaningful strength — as long as you push yourself while you're there.
item.dc:creator: Will Stone

item.title: All eyes are on Rubio as he navigates the world in 2 critical roles
item.description: Rubio is the first person to hold both roles at the same time since Secretary of State Henry Kissinger in the 1970s.
item.content:encoded:
Rubio is the first person to hold both roles at the same time since Secretary of State Henry Kissinger in the 1970s.

(Image credit: Evan Vucci)
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordoñez

item.title: DC Delegate Eleanor Holmes Norton is ending her reelection campaign for Congress
item.description: The 18-term delegate for the District of Columbia in Congress and a veteran of the Civil Rights Movement has filed paperwork to end her campaign for reelection.
item.content:encoded:
The 18-term delegate for the District of Columbia in Congress and a veteran of the Civil Rights Movement has filed paperwork to end her campaign for reelection.

(Image credit: Mark Schiefelbein)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Israel launches 'large-scale operation' to locate last hostage in Gaza
item.description: The return of the remaining hostage, Ran Gvili, has been widely seen as removing the remaining obstacle to proceeding with the U.S.-brokered ceasefire's second phase.
item.content:encoded:
The return of the remaining hostage, Ran Gvili, has been widely seen as removing the remaining obstacle to proceeding with the U.S.-brokered ceasefire's second phase.

(Image credit: Leo Correa)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Super Bowl 60 is set and it's a rematch from 11 years ago: Patriots vs. Seahawks
item.description: The Patriots will seek their NFL-record seventh Super Bowl victory when they face the Seahawks on Feb. 8 at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, Calif.
item.content:encoded:
The Patriots will seek their NFL-record seventh Super Bowl victory when they face the Seahawks on Feb. 8 at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, Calif.

(Image credit: John Froschauer)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Power outages and canceled flights as winter storm brings snow, sleet and ice
item.description: Reporters from across the NPR Network are covering the storm in each state — the impact and how officials are responding.
item.content:encoded:
Reporters from across the NPR Network are covering the storm in each state — the impact and how officials are responding.

(Image credit: Charly Triballeau)
item.dc:creator: Joe Hernandez

item.title: Where is the threat from Russia and China in the Arctic?
item.description: As Trump points to Russia and China near Greenland, experts say the biggest Russian and Chinese activity is elsewhere in the Arctic.
item.content:encoded: As Trump points to Russia and China near Greenland, experts say the biggest Russian and Chinese activity is elsewhere in the Arctic.
item.dc:creator: Jackie Northam

item.title: Videos and eyewitnesses refute federal account of Minneapolis shooting
item.description: Trump officials have called the victim a "domestic terrorist." State officials warn such unfounded accusations threaten the integrity of the federal investigation.
item.content:encoded:
Trump officials have called the victim a "domestic terrorist." State officials warn such unfounded accusations threaten the integrity of the federal investigation.

(Image credit: Zaydee Sanchez for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Ludden

item.title: Senate Democrats and Republicans call for investigation into killing of Alex Pretti
item.description: Sen. Tina Smith, D-Minn., accuses the federal government of a "cover-up," and Sen. Thom Tillis, R-N.C., warns White House against attempts to "shut down an investigation."
item.content:encoded:
Sen. Tina Smith, D-Minn., accuses the federal government of a "cover-up," and Sen. Thom Tillis, R-N.C., warns White House against attempts to "shut down an investigation."

(Image credit: Adam Gray/AP)
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett
